attributes.action: To close schools and colleges down for appropriate amount of time.
attributes.additional_details: If this in unconsiderable by the government then we would request the government to enforce all schools and colleges to have a weekly rota and reduce the amount of students by going to school or college by 2 days a week and to shorten the times of school day perhaps . Morning classes and by lunchtime its hometime or afternoon clases and the rest of the time at home using online tools to continue our education.  This will reduce the number of covid19 cases and avoid another pandemic .
attributes.background: As schools and colleges have started there has been a rapidly increase of covid 19 cases and rising and could lead to a 2nd wave. Therefore to ensure the students and adults are safe . We would like the government to close down schools and colleges for a appropriate amount of time .

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Keep schools closed until Covid 19 is no longer a threat: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316404

Halt the reopening of schools until the NEU's 5 tests are met: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321101

Keep schools closed in the UK until an effective Cov-19 vaccine is available: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319292  

Delay opening of schools until Test Track and Trace for Covid 19 is working: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320891
